meanings.definition: In a manner that involves consuming or eager to consume large amounts of food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The hungry child ate voraciously at the buffet, trying every dish.
meanings.sent2: She always eats voraciously when she's at a birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The voraciously eating squirrel made the other animals laugh at the park.
meanings.sent4: The voraciously hungry bear devoured the picnic basket in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The image of the voraciously eating monster in the story stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: In a manner that involves consuming or eager to consume large amounts of something.
meanings.sent1: The bookworm voraciously read through the entire series in a week.
meanings.sent2: He voraciously collected stamps from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The voraciously shopping teenager spent all her allowance in one day.
meanings.sent4: The voraciously curious child asked endless questions about the stars.
meanings.sent5: The voraciously growing plant reached the ceiling in just a few months.
